goal.ch: 課程規劃並教授5個機械量測主題，著重在個別主題的基礎原理陳述及實際應用；而這些主題都出於頻譜分析及量測技術的基礎與其應用。
goal.en: This course comprises 5 measurement topics, emphasized on fundamental principle and their application in individual topic laboratories.  Particularly, they all originate from and relate to the basis and application of spectral analysis and measurement technique.

outline.ch:
主題1: 感測器與量測系統校正 討論校正原理，以麥克風及加速規為例；分貝(dB)定義及應用。
主題2: 動態訊號(如振動訊號、機械噪音 等)之量測與頻譜分析(訊號傅立葉分析)；以及心理聲學與音響權值(weighting)計算簡介、及簡易噪音計製作原理陳述。
主題3: 旋轉系統靜態(單面)、動態(雙面)平衡校正之原理、與平衡校正設備設計原則。
主題4: 以強度調變(幅值調變)光源輸入介質，解調變後估測輸出光與入射光的光程相位差。
主題5: 激振器及衝擊錘組之使用；懸臂樑及薄板自然頻率之量測及計算；結構振型估測。
方式1— 模態測試原理與實驗；
方式2— 運轉位移形狀原理與實驗。
outline.en:
Topic 1: Calibration of sensors and measurement systems Discuss calibration principle to take precision microphones and vibration accelerometers as examples. Define and apply decibel (dB) in varied ways.
Topic 2:Fourier/Spectral analysis of dynamic signals (vibration and mechanical noise). Introduce and discuss psychoacoustics (A, B, C, D weighting), and the implementation of sound meter.
Topic 3: Static (single-plane) and dynamic (multiple-plane) balancing of rotary machinery. Discuss the design of balance-adjusting equipment.
Topic 4: Illuminate amplitude/intensity modulated light into medium to estimate phase differences (delays) between output-emitted and incident light through demodulation.
Topic 5: Introduce the use of a shaker and a hammer kit. Estimate the resonant frequency and associate mode shape of a beam and a plate.
Approach 1— Modal testing
Approach 2— Operation deflection shape
